meanings.sent1: The team's performance was punchless, lacking any real impact on the game.
meanings.sent2: The speech felt punchless, failing to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's punchless powers made for a comical scene as he tried to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her argument was as punchless as a deflated balloon, unable to sway anyone's opinion.
meanings.sent5: The old car's engine was so punchless that it struggled to climb even the smallest hill.

meanings.sent1: The movie's punchless ending left the audience feeling unsatisfied.
meanings.sent2: The company's marketing campaign was punchless, failing to attract new customers.
meanings.sent3: The magician's punchless trick drew laughter from the crowd instead of amazement.
meanings.sent4: His punchless attempts at persuasion fell flat, unable to convince anyone.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's punches were so punchless that his opponent barely felt them.
